issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing popover, I encountered an app crash, which *I cannot reproduce*.

Possible steps:

1. Please use this repo

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_tests_internal/tree/master/FeatureTest/Popover

2. Acceptance>timob_5493
3. Click Done

Actual result: crash, which I cannot reproduce.
fields.summary: iOS7: Intermittent crash while testing popover
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201308302458
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3.v20130906144623

https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/tree/3_1_X
Xcode5-DP6
CLI: 3.1.2
Alloy: 1.2.2
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS7(11A4449d)

comments.body: [~oromero] Please try to reproduce, and if unable, mark as such and remove qe-investigate label. Thanks.

Closing as cannot reproduce with:

Titanium SDK, build:3.1.3.v20130916110056
